New Records: Ferran Torres’ 20th goal in 43 international appearances, lifting him to 13th on La Roja’s all-time scoring list
Key Match Events: Spain’s goal was superbly constructed and finished — with incisive passes from Aymeric Laporte and Dani Olmo setting up a chance that was curled home off the post by Torres
Pre-Game Insights: De la Fuente said before the match he would pick the best team to win this game
Post-Match Reflections: De la Fuente’s squad achieved the latter — which is testament to the spirit he has built in this group
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spain had already secured their place at the top of Group B after wins over Croatia and Italy
They travel to Cologne next, where they will face one of the four best third-placed teams on Sunday, June 30 at 8pm UK/3pm ET
